typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	containerName as string,
	entityName as string
}
source(output(
		{timestamp-0} as long,
		{systemId-2000000000} as string,
		{SystemCreatedAt-2000000001} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: ($entityName),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'deltas',
	local: true,
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'']) ~> Deltas
source(output(
		{timestamp-0} as long,
		{systemId-2000000000} as string,
		{SystemCreatedAt-2000000001} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: ($entityName),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'data',
	local: true,
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'']) ~> CurrentData
Deltas filter(isNull({SystemCreatedAt-2000000001})) ~> FilterForDeleted
CombineWithDeltas, FilterForDeleted exists(CombineWithDeltas@{systemId-2000000000} == Deltas@{systemId-2000000000},
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> RemoveDeleted
FilterEmptyRows sort(desc({timestamp-0}, false)) ~> SortByTimestamp
SortByTimestamp aggregate(groupBy({systemId-2000000000}),
	each(match(name!='systemId-2000000000'), $$ = first($$))) ~> PickLastChanges
Deltas, CurrentData union(byName: true)~> CombineWithDeltas
RemoveDeleted filter(not(isNull({systemId-2000000000}))) ~> FilterEmptyRows
PickLastChanges sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: ("{$entityName}.cdm.json/{$entityName}"),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'staging',
	partitionPath: ("staging/{$entityName}"),
	folderPath: '',
	fileSystem: ($containerName),
	subformat: 'parquet',
	corpusPath: '/',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: ($containerName),
	truncate: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	)) ~> Staging
